A.name: Flank Openings
A.content: ECO Volume A covers flank and irregular openings – systems that begin with moves other than 1.e4 or 1.d4, along with flexible transpositions from them.

A00-A09.name: A00-A09: Irregular & Uncommon Openings
A00-A09.content: Unorthodox first moves such as 1.g4, 1.Nc3, 1.b4, 1.f4, and related systems.

B.name: Semi-Open Games
B.content: ECO Volume B catalogues semi-open games, where White plays 1.e4 and Black responds with something other than 1...e5. This includes the Caro-Kann, Sicilian, Pirc/Modern, Alekhine's, and Scandinavian defenses.

B00-B09.name: B00-B09: Irregular King's Pawn Defenses
B00-B09.content: Rare answers to 1.e4 like the Nimzowitsch, Scandinavian, Pirc, and Modern systems.

D.name: Closed Games & Gambits
D.content: ECO Volume D focuses on closed games after 1.d4, covering queen's pawn systems, the Queen's Gambit family, and the Grünfeld Defense.

D00-D29.content: Colle, London, Veresov, Trompowsky, and other 1.d4 systems without an early c4.
